content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(111.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 117.5, -30.5), boiler(position 111.5, -32.0), offshore pump(position 106.5, -32.5) and small-electric-pole(position 111.5, -30.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position 39.5, -79.5) that puts into furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Belt group (position 39.5, -83.5) that connects the furnace at position(41.0, -80.0) to burner inserter at position(39.5, -79.5)

### Offshore pump group at position(116.5, -54.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position 116.5, -54.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 115.5, -51.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 116.5, -53.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 116.5, -49.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 116.5, -47.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 116.5, -45.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 115.5, -43.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 115.5, -41.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 116.5, -40.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 118.5, -40.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 120.5, -40.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 122.5, -39.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 124.5, -39.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 126.5, -37.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 128.5, -35.5)
-  Offshore pump (position 130.5, -33.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities function
-  Ensure the correct number of arguments are passed to the function. The function takes 3 positional arguments: two positions and a prototype.
-  Ensure the positions passed to the function are of the correct type. The function expects Position objects, not floats or other types.

### Errors when accessing position attribute
-  Ensure that the object has a position attribute. In this case, the Position object itself does not have a position attribute.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the tile where the entity is being placed is not occupied by another entity.

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  -  offshore_pump: OffshorePump object
  -  boiler: Boiler object
  -  Prototype.Pipe: Prototype object
  -  Position: Position object
